wikipedia_page.main: Percy Webster Adams (5 September 1900 – 28 September 1962) was an English first-class cricketer.

response: The 1919 Wisden honoured Five Public School Cricketers of the Year - Percy Adams, Percy Chapman, Adrian Gore, Lionel Hedges and Norman Partridge. Chapman went on to captain England.
* Percy Adams (footballer) (1914–1984), footballer who played for Port Vale in the 1930s
